fastdbShim.h

00001 /* This is a new file that has been added to fastdb sources as part of the porting effort. This file
00002  * captures stubbed implementation of functionality that is not available in the CFW VxWorks image
00003  * such that fastdb can be made to work. fastdbShim.h.changes file gives details of the stubbed calls
00004  */
00005 #ifndef __fastdbShim__
00006 #define __fastdbShim__

00009 #define IPC_RMID 0

00046 // VxWorks puts the module id in the high order bits of errno
00047 #if defined(VXWORKS) && defined(BUILDING_FASTDB)
00048 #undef errno
00049 #define errno   ((__errnoRef()) & 0x7fff)
00050 #endif // VXWORKS && BUILDING_FASTDB
00051 
00052 
00053 extern "C" {
00054 
00055 #define UTSNAME_SHORT_NAME_SIZE 80
00056 #define UTSNAME_LONG_NAME_SIZE  256
00057 #define UTSNAME_NUMBER_SIZE 8
00058 
00059 // We need to include proper header file
00060 struct utsname
00061     {
00062     char sysname[UTSNAME_SHORT_NAME_SIZE];  /* operating system name */
00063     char nodename[UTSNAME_LONG_NAME_SIZE];  /* network node name */
00064     char release[UTSNAME_SHORT_NAME_SIZE];  /* OS release level */
00065     char version[UTSNAME_LONG_NAME_SIZE];   /* operating system version */
00066     char machine[UTSNAME_LONG_NAME_SIZE];   /* hardware type (BSP model) */
00067     char endian[UTSNAME_NUMBER_SIZE];       /* architecture endianness */
00068     char kernelversion[UTSNAME_SHORT_NAME_SIZE];/* VxWorks kernel version */
00069     char processor[UTSNAME_SHORT_NAME_SIZE];    /* CPU type */
00070     char bsprevision[UTSNAME_SHORT_NAME_SIZE];  /* VxWorks BSP revision */
00071     char builddate[UTSNAME_SHORT_NAME_SIZE];    /* VxWorks kernel build date */
00072     };
00073 
00074 }
